description:
Lee opens a dojo because he feels like he isn`t keeping up with his training. He is hoping challengers will come to his dojo to face him in battle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On recherche des écumeurs de dojos
Viva Doujouyaburi! Seishun wa Bakuhatsu Da
ท้าประลองเส้นทางวีว่า ระเบิดวัยหนุ่ม
ビバ道場破り! 青春はバクハツだ
